name: A. Restoring Three Numbers
statement:
Polycarp has guessed three positive integers a, b and c. He keeps these
numbers in secret, but he writes down four numbers on a board in
arbitrary order their pairwise sums (three numbers) and sum of all three
numbers (one number). So, there are four numbers on a board in random
order: a+b, a+c, b+c and a+b+c.You have to guess three numbers a, b and
c using given numbers. Print three guessed integers in any order.Pay
attention that some given numbers a, b and c can be equal (it is also
possible that a=b=c).
